text: We're looking for a candidate to fill this position in an exciting company. To be responsible for operating and sustaining the Nursing Home for residents. To provide, through high standards of professional practice, a caring environment conducive to the physical, emotional, social and spiritual needs of each resident in the Nursing Home in a way that ensures their privacy and dignity and enhances their quality of life. To review as necessary a care plan for each resident based upon an assessment carried out by a qualified nurse employed by the nursing home. The care plan is formulated and reviewed in conjunction with the patient, the family or outside agency as appropriate. Be responsible and accountable for the standard and quality of the nursing care provided in the nursing home. Registered General Nurse and/or Registered Mental Nurse. Minimum 3 out of the last 5 years managerial experience within an elderly care setting. A Health Care Management Qualification or a minimum of at least 2 years management experience with well-developed administrative skills. Experience of staff training and development needs. An appreciation of budgeting and best value principles is desirable
